result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
result.translation: Ivyo vyashikiye abagarariji ku kwimonogoza kwabo mu guca kubiri n’amabwirizwa y’Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo. Uwo wese rero yimonogoje mu guca kubiri n’amabwirizwa y’Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo, mu vy'ukuri Imana Allah Izomuhana Imuhashe kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
